text: Steven Austin (born 27 December 1990) is an Anguillan footballer who plays for the Anguilla national football team. ==International career== Austin made his senior international debut on 23 March 2015 in a 5-0 defeat to Nicaragua in World Cup qualifying. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Anguillan footballers Category:Anguilla international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Steven Austin (footballer)
